description:
- “The Tension Held”: a dark fever-dream about a tarantula triggers an argument between a couple which ends in violence.
- A guy wakes up in the middle of the night with a pulsing red vision. He had a nightmare about a tarantula killing a house spider. He becomes anxious and paranoid, worrying about his distant girlfriend. When the girl starts sleep-talking about a happy memory, he is finally relieved. She wakes up, only to finally be fuelled to put an end to their relationship and does this through violence.
- The set simulates a partially flooded bedroom.
